website_summaries.verdict: Apple bundles its Wireless Keyboard with every new iMac because it matches the computer's strengths in terms of minimal design and simple functionality. While some may bemoan its lack of extra features, the Apple Wireless Keyboard does the job and looks good doing it.
pros: top row keys offers one-touch access to popular Mac features
cons: small keys may feel cramped for some users

customer_reviews.title: The setup was quick and easy. It requires to AA batteries
customer_reviews.text: After my fairly new MacBook Pro decided it no longer had a keyboard attached to it (and I didn't want to pay a small fortune to have it repaired), I purchased this keyboard instead. The setup was quick and easy. It requires to AA batteries, which often last for a couple of weeks, even with continuous use. (However, I would recommend getting something like, so that you have an endless supply of charged batteries.) Even though I hate that my MacBook Pro is no longer a laptop, this product saved me hundreds of dollars at the Apple Store!
customer_reviews.author: Eir M.

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard to replace my Apple bluetooth keyboard which failed after several years of light usage (The ‘return’ key stopped working). I bought this one based on the good reviews, and it appears to be at least as well built as the Apple keyboard. For the $149 Apple keyboard price, I can buy eight of these. It works fine. The keyboard feel and key spacing are very similar to the Apple’s. It runs on two AAA batteries; I’m using eneleoop rechargeables. Very easy to do the Bluetooth pairing. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: It makes it so easy to type that my kids complain about how long ...
customer_reviews.text: I had used one of these for several years to type messages and emails on my iPhone and IPad. It is much easier than trying to use the touchpad keyboard with my fat old fingers. It makes it so easy to type that my kids complain about how long my text messages are. The keyboard itself is especially nice to use. I would use it as my regular keyboard if I can find a way to use it on my PC. This refurbished keyboard worked as well as my original "new" key board that I spilled coffee on.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wilson

customer_reviews.title: like our old keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement keyboard for the one that was ruined by a spilled beverage. Looks the same as our old keyboard, but the keys aren't smooth, like our old keyboard. They are textured. This bothered me for about a week, but now I don't notice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Jean A. Jenner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Responsive, Stylish, but no back-lit keys!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes.. Just yes. The keys are perfectly responsive, there is just enough give when you push. The keyboard is a bit heavier than expected, but that's ok because it makes the keyboard feel more premium. Oh, premium! This feels extremely premium, the aluminum is finely made. I absolutely feel comfortable typing all day on this keyboard. If you're looking for a comfortable and stylish keyboard, look no further. Actually, there is one problem.... No back-lit keys!!! (by the way, I'd use this to type 5-6 page documents for university on my iPad Air 2 . This allows you to make the most out of your tablet.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: One of the best keyboards ever
customer_reviews.text: The best keyboard of all time was the IBM Selectric typewriter keyboard. That is the gold standard against which all others are measured. This one comes darn close. I have paired it with tablets and with Pages working on my iPod and it is comfortable and responsive. It is also very light and fits easily in my bag. I hardly notice I'm carrying it. The cover where you put in the batteries screws out, and you screw it back in using a slot that is designed to work with a coin, a really nice touch. I've even used a fingernail in a pinch. And it's quiet! Incredibly quiet. Perfect for typing around other people. Best portable keyboard I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Grimmell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality, silent keys and long lasting battery usage
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly sized, distant keys for easy typing especially for ones with small and light hands. This works perfectly well on a Mac OSX as it does on a Windows 10 machine. Having used cheaper versions of the same from manufacturers available online, I have also found that the battery has been lasting me quite well despite 2months of over 6hrs+ daily on this keyboard. Overall, a product that stands to the brand name of Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Naga

customer_reviews.title: Sold as used, looked new
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one of these to clear up desk space, but I didn't want to pay full price. This unit was perfect. It looked like new. It's much smaller than I realized, so it took some getting used to. I've had this unit five months now and have had no problems at all. Other connected devices - like the Apple magic mouse and trackpad frequently lose connection with my computer, but this keyboard hasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is a joy
customer_reviews.text: I have loved my iPad from the first day. I am rather good at using the iPad's on-screen keyboard, but there are times when I want to type rather long documents and a wireless keyboard would be a help. The Apple Wireless Keyboard more than meets my needs. The keyboard is small and therefore very portable. But it does not feel cramped. When I turn on Bluetooth on my iPad, the iPad connects quickly to the keyboard. I think those who are used to PC keyboards will face a little adjustment to the Apple Wireless Keyboard. The quality of the product makes making the adjustment worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: John V. Harper

customer_reviews.title: OK, but you are paying a lot for the Apple logo.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the Logitech wireless keyboard. It costs far less, runs on solar power (not batteries), and the keyboard has a better feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Wally S

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard.  Compact, light, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Spilled coffee on it, soda, dropped it, had a 2nd one I keep in my backpack for my iPad... this thing takes a serious beating. That said, it can turn on sometimes when not expected (so watch it) and when (and if) a key comes off, there are several youtube telling you how to put it back on. Kind of finicky, but doable. Not as easy as replacing a key with a PC, but still takes less than 3min.
customer_reviews.author: stayathomedad

customer_reviews.title: How long it took !!!
customer_reviews.text: finally received my keyboard . I ordered it on August 28!!! I’m not sure I could place another order with you after all this I’ve been through with this order , going back & forth with emails checking to see if in route . I really didn’t want to take my time it just seem so unseasonably to keep checking the status of my order , lost once then again took forever! Just wasted time I’ll never get back . Dee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another elegant - and well executed - Apple product
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first iMac 5 months ago and was blown away by both the simplicity and power of this deceivingly small footprint all in one computer. I have to say the same thing about this keyboard. It takes almost no desk space at all, pairs immediately upon activating, and definitely contributes to greater typing accuracy due to mandatory hand placement. It has a very nice tactile feedback upon keypress and is as responsive as any wired keyboard. The fact that it matches my aluminum fronted iMac is another plus. Apple attention to detail and elegance is evident in this beautifully small - but exceptionally well executed - product.
customer_reviews.author: davyboy

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This tiny, feather-weight keyboard kept my MacBook Pro from going "air-borne" when the keyboard cooked itself somehow. Eventually, it wouldn't respond to this keyboard, BUT - my most excellent husband managed to pair up via Bluetooth this Apple featherweight to my DROIDX. BRILLIANT. New MacBook is en route - but I may keep using it with the Droid. It's just SO MUCH EASIER to post more than 2 words. Swype is cool, this is better. I hit the letter I want every time, not one either side of it. Bravo, Apple! Creativity, excellent design, & just total coolness once again rises to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Lightworker USA

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to the Ipad
customer_reviews.text: I got so tired of having to try to see around the popup keyboard on the Ipad when I was typing on Facebook or anything with any length. Plus, the Ipad would make changes in what I was writing which I could not see to correct until the keyboard was droppped down. A hugh pain! The wireless keyboard was the best thing that I could have gotten to make the Ipad work more like a computer. The Apple keyboard is very sturdy and easy to use. We got a good deal on it since we bought the older model right after the new one came out.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Great, easy to use keyboard that connects easily. I mainly use it with my iPad. There does seem to be a delay sometimes, but usually catches up pretty quick with no additional actions from me. Very sturdy design holds up in a bag. Only problem with the keyboard in the bag it is turning on by something hitting the button and will connect from across the room. I got in the habit of taking the batteries out when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: It's shiny and expensive but I like it
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical about this guy. I'm a real nut when it comes to keyboards. After a couple of days I was able to type on this thing without errors. I love that it's wireless, however, occasionally I have issues with my windows machine (Bootcamp) as it likes to disconnect when the computer sleeps or restarts and I have to go to Devices and re-add it. All in all I'm really happy with this keyboard. It's high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chrimbus

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Got this today as a replacement for the MS ergo keyboard I've used the past few years. First impression when I opened the shipping box was that I got the wrong item-it was pretty small...no-REALLY small compared to the dinosaur I've been using. Overall feel/notes: Keys are very responsive, not spongy. Quiet when I type-no "clacking" sounds. Small size factor is very cool...seems to be well built and very solid. Lightweight, and the function keys work as they should (Dashboard, Expose, media buttons work great with iTunes). Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wetherill

customer_reviews.title: The slim and compact design with soft keying works great.
customer_reviews.text: The slim and compact design with soft keying works great. This was a used item not new. Thought it was new. Works fine for me. Surprised about price when advertised as new.
customer_reviews.author: P. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I just got an ipad, and I installed Pages on it. the on-screen keyboard is not that great if you have a lot of typing to do, so I bought this keyboard. I love it. It has the Tab function, and you don't have to shift back and forth for punctuation and number keys. The keyboard is comfortable--it is smaller than a standard keyboard, but I don't find myself making too many typos with it. Since it's not connected to the ipad, it is nice to use, since you can adjust the layout of what you're working on--screen, keyboard, text, etc.
customer_reviews.author: kimberleena

customer_reviews.title: Like this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: There are only two things I think this keyboard could improve on: 1. The addition of a number pad to the right side of the keyboard. 2. Opening the chamber a bit larger for the batteries. The battery life on this is surprisingly long, however, I have gotten the batteries stuck in the chamber--getting them out is very difficult. This keyboard is better than most; and I was impressed with it's functionality and life battery. Overall, I would buy this product again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Smooth connection to my Ipad 4
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this item from an excellent seller with Apple Box. It paired smoothly with my ipad 4 after turning on Bluetooth on Ipad & right side round button on keyboard. It displayed his name & code & immediately paired. I went to Apple site to print small manual for reference. Keys work well. Very pleased with item & transaction! Jeanne
customer_reviews.author: lekettle

customer_reviews.title: Another keyboard winner from Apple
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard as a companion to my iPad. My older bluetooth Apple keyboard, which I've had for a few years, would not synch with the iPad. This one is perfect. Like previous models, typing is an exquisite experience. The keys are perfect for my fingers. It is lightweight, taking only two AA batteries that last quite a while. The keyboard is small enough for easy portability. It also works great with my old Macbook Pro as well. Definitely recommended, whether you use OS X or iOS products or not.
customer_reviews.author: missed

customer_reviews.title: never buy this
customer_reviews.text: This product does not wot we at all to much key on the board work wrong i ha to press twice or more on a ot of key on the board As you can see i will return the product it is a robbery
customer_reviews.author: beatnik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for docked Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I dock my 13" macbook pro at home with connections to a 24" monitor, a couple of external drives, a scanner, a turntable, speakers, etc. The Apple wireless Keyboard completes the package and lets my macbook function like a desktop at home. No messy cables with the Bluetooth connection. It has been problem free. The metal construction is sturdy and attractive. The keys are responsive and do not invite debris as they protrude snuggly from the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Rootsfinder

customer_reviews.title: Dirty, Dirty, Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Works great, my 3 stars are for the "refurbish". Sent in a clear plastic baggy I could see the dirt and grime before even pulling it out. It would appear the original owner used this while eating which I shouldn't be able to tell. I would expect things of this nature to come cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I got this quick and it's exactly the way it was described. It was 'used' and I can see a couple of little cosmetic flaws (a scratch on the underside plastic and the area around the power button is not exactly perfect shape) but it works as needed (it's my travel keyboard). It paired with my MacBook Pro (I'm typing this on it) and I love it's lightweight feel and touch. Excellent purchase. Perhaps next time, I'll go for the full Apple Keyboard with the numeric keys.
customer_reviews.author: Ginamina

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but it works well.
customer_reviews.text: This has all of the elegance and functionality I expect from Apple. It's a shame they don't make more affordable options. I'd have been fine with a USB keyboard that I don't have to replace the batteries in every few months. But it's still far better than anything I could find designed for a PC.
customer_reviews.author: The Vargle

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my daughter over a year ago and forgot to write review. She still uses it all the time, great product!
customer_reviews.author: judith k ranch

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t like water!
customer_reviews.text: Just don’t get a drop of water on this or forget it not gonna work anymore .
customer_reviews.author: Beenice

customer_reviews.title: it's exactly like the one that came with my computer
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, a brand new keyboard with batteries even though it stated batteries not included, it's exactly like the one that came with my computer, and it shipped as advertised, great device, fast shipping, couldn't be happier, thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lint

customer_reviews.title: That may seem a little dumb to someone else
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed how it found my iPad with no problems. It has a smooth stroke. The only complaint is it did not come with any type of instructions. That may seem a little dumb to someone else, but the keyboard has keys that I am not familiar with and do not know how to engage them.
customer_reviews.author: wood

customer_reviews.title: Good Apple keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great Apple product as usual. Excellent Bluetooth connection to my iMac. Good battery life. Might want to purchase invisible cover-does get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I have two now--just love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second one of these after I lost the first one in a "secret" pocket in my luggage. Shortly after it arrived, I found the original--of course! I like this product so much that I kept both, one for my office at work, and one for my travels, to use with my IPad and phone. I am a fast typist and the experience of typing on the Phone or the IPad was very frustrating. The keyboard makes it a breeze, and it's so light that I don't mind toting it places.
customer_reviews.author: N.E. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for long travel / writing needs
customer_reviews.text: The iPad is great, but the keyboard doesn't work in every situation. When I'm traveling or when there's some serious writing / typing I need to get done, I grab the wireless keyboard and start hacking away. The keyboard is slim, it works over bluetooth (so it's not JUST for the iPad), and feels like an actual keyboard (no plastic-y feeling). I have the Caselogic 10.2 bag for both my iPad and keyboard, and the fit is nice. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: @wiljr

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard Warped
customer_reviews.text: Started using and noticed that it was not level and wobbled when typing. Looking at it from the correct angle I could see it was warped and that was causing the wobble. Too late to return and it did work fine except for the wobble. A little bit of duck tape steadied the board when typing.
customer_reviews.author: MCK

customer_reviews.title: Apple's little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Works well with the iPad2 - so much better than the on-screen virtual keyboard. Key action is fine by me as it similar/same as the corded Apple extended keyboard I use for the iMac. I have found no failings or short comings in it - only positive attributes. There are less expensive options - but this keyboard works well, looks good and (fool that I am some will say) I trust Apple's products as they have generally served me well for the last 26 years.
customer_reviews.author: G. H.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I just love the portability of this little keyboard. I had surgery on my shoulder and it was hard to lift my arm up high enough to type. with this I could bring the keyboard down to a level that was not painful. The only thing that would make it better would be a number pad. But if I can type without a number pad on a laptop I guess I can get use to it on this keyboard. As for battery life, I haven't had it long enough to know how long that is.
customer_reviews.author: CatCol

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard but hard to find in true new condition ...
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard but hard to find in true new condition as they are no longer made. Be wary of so called "certified refurbished" as most are not truly refurbs, just broken.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased my iPad 2, I knew that with 2 more years of grad school and my own personal writing projects, I would need a physical keyboard, not just the digital one on the iPad's screen. After lots of research and much debate, I finally chose Apple's bluetooth keyboard, and I couldn't be happier. It syncs easily, the batteries last forever, it's lightweight, comfortable, and easy to use. And it'll work with my mac or my work pc too.
customer_reviews.author: ABShaef

customer_reviews.title: Click, click, click
customer_reviews.text: This rechargable keyboard is a blast and is a great tool for the computer.
customer_reviews.author: W. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love this Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard, i love the size and the feel of it. I am a big fan of apple's products and their keyboards are amazing. The flat keys are not for everyone, but i love them and type much better on them. It is also nice to have one less cable to worry about and the battery life on the keyboard is nice. This paired with my magic trackpad is a great combo and i love it. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking into getting a wireless keyboard apple person or not.
customer_reviews.author: Eric9297

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: really good deal. it came to be really fast. looks like new and works like a champ. Works with my iphone, ipad, and PC. but obviously can only be connected to one device at a time. Set up is simple and i love being able to control the ipod app,volume,and brightness right from the keyboard. if you get this keyboard google it to learn all of the shortcut commands. I just wish there was a key to get back to the home screen, notepad, mail and other keyboard enabled apps.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With My Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard. After buying 3 generic BT keyboards, I finally spent the money for the Apple. It's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: PHK

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, functional but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Much like everything Apple makes, I love everything about this product except the price. That being said, it's one of the best keyboards I've ever owned. I am not much of a keypad guy so I don't miss it. Very stylish and functional and works well with my Macbook Pro, iPad, and iPhone. Battery life is great and the special keys for the Mac (e.g. dashboard, expose, audio, etc.) can't be beat. 4 stars and not 5 because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: It is ok. But there is a big scratch ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. But there is a big scratch on the item and the power control button seems to be closing to be broken.
customer_reviews.author: Yang

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel and sturdy build quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel and sturdy build quality, but it goes through batteries faster than I would like. I usually change the batteries 3-4 times a year and compared to some logitech products that seems a lot.
customer_reviews.author: dxbcust

customer_reviews.title: Simply Remarkable
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best keyboard I have ever had the pleasure of typing on. I really do the prefer the feel of the keys & the island style layout to most other keyboards. The Battery life is also nothing short of outstanding & the device itself is unbelievably light & portable yet extremely efficient. Although I probably use my mouse far more than my keyboard, I believe this keyboard is able to cater to all types of users including the heavy typists. I say give it a spin
customer_reviews.author: Retrostarscream

customer_reviews.title: Get more out of your iPad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the iPad but needed to be able to get text into the iPad. I looked at a lot of alternatives. Thanks to reading reviews I saw that many were pleased with this keyboard. There will always be those who have problems. I have been using this device for about 6 months. I LOVE it! The touch of the keys is wonderful and so much easier than trying to use the keyboard on the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Professional

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My dad specifically told me he wanted this keyboard over any other. The reason he told me is because he's a picky man. He uses it for his Ipad and he loves it. I've given it a shot and I have to agree. It's responsive, the way it's positioned makes it easy to type on, and it just plain feels good to type on. If I had an Ipad, I'd buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: A simple item for a simple task.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard works as described. We use it with the iPad to do college work and it really helps. I like the fact that I can take my iPad around with my movies, music, and games and still work on my school work. I've gotten really good at typing on the iPad but to really increase my work efficiancy a keyboard was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but could use some improvements
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and well built keyboard which works well with computers and iPads. The battery life is pretty good; we probably get three months out of each par of batteries we install. The only complaint is the lack of a number pad. If Apple would produce the full-sized keyboard as a wireless one, it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna J. Rupp-kilgore

customer_reviews.title: a little dirty but a quick wipe made it look brand new
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised and on time, a little dirty but a quick wipe made it look brand new! barely any scratches or any damage to the keys. Literally feels brand new but cheap! No use issues!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: It comes with batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought apple products. And I probably always will. This keyboard is awesome. It's slim, light, and super cute. It travels well. It comes with batteries. It hooks up to my Mac. It hooks up to my PC. It hooks up to my iPhone 3GS, even though the folks at the Apple store told me it wouldn't. Connection / Set up with all of these took all of 30 seconds. I honestly can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Quick Set Up.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Quick Set Up. I purchased this used and got a great deal. The keyboard was set up in a couple minutes and has worked like a charm every since. The seller was responsive to my question and shipped promptly. I recommend both the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree La Puma-Watson, Author

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Mac Mini
customer_reviews.text: Great Bluetooth keyboard! I use this for a Mac Mini, and never turn the keyboard off so a set of good quality batteries will last a long time. I probably go about six months without changing them. I have the companion track pad too. Minimal and stylish. Takes up little desk space.
customer_reviews.author: GrooV67

customer_reviews.title: Small size, good connection, pleasant to use
customer_reviews.text: I love my Apple wireless keyboard. It's very small and sleek looking. It was a little hard to get used to since the keypad is not there, but the rest is the same size as a normal keyboard. It's lightweight and doesn't take up much space. It makes a good connection with my computer and works perfectly. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its great!
customer_reviews.text: It came as when it was indicated to arrive, the slight angle makes for a much better way of typing due to the lack of strain on your wrist. I personally purchased this item because it makes typing up notes from my text books much easier than looking from laptop to book all the time. So I guess you might say its the versatility. However, when i take my keyboard with me, i put it back into its original package cause i'm afraid to damage it in some form. The product itself works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy d.

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this keyboard. I use it daily and never have any issues with it. It's small, portable, light weight and absolutely fantastic performance.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: run out battery fast and sometimes on and off... not really recommend
customer_reviews.author: Real

customer_reviews.title: Nice Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The appearance of this keyboard is awesome. I use it with the Mac Mini, so the portability issue is one I don't really know how to comment on. I however like to use the mac from a recliner and this keyboard is perfect for that. It's small and thin, but key spacing is perfect. If you need a num pad this isn't for you. The mac lets you know the battery level (I have a pc bluetooth mouse and it has no indicator for this).
customer_reviews.author: G. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Ol' Reliable Apple Wireless Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless keyboard. Syncs flawlessly with my iPad. I would definitely recommend this product. The only thing that would keep it at 4-stars is just the price. Apple will always be at a premium, but you get what you pay for?
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Getting rid of the number pad finally lets me center the keyboard properly while still keepingthe mouse within reach. Although this keyboard is pricey, the build quality of the keyboard seems excellent so far and the bluetooth works reliably. It is comfortable to use though it took a little adjustment to type on the chiclet style keys.
customer_reviews.author: I. Park

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and feels good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice keyboard. Of course works well with Apple OS Snow Leopard. I sometimes have bluetooth connectivity issues with Windows XP where when I log on I have to manually pair the keyboard to the computer again. This is a bit of a hassle and I cannot figure out why it does not automatically re-pair itself. It would have been nice if it came with a travel pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Paym

customer_reviews.title: Handy with iPad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard because I wanted to take some serious notes on my iPad (trying to use it as a laptop replacement). Worked fine. Can't really talk about battery life, since I haven't used it since that 4 day stretch. Best feature: it's small, no useless numerical pad. Also, arrows were handy. Do be careful to shut off the keyboard if you tuck it into a tight bag.
customer_reviews.author: David Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Apple wireless keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I got it on july 6th, 2011. Since then i had no problems with it. I run snow leopard and windows vista on my late 2006 24" iMac6,1. This keyboard is paired to both operating systems on my mac. It is reliable and easy to use. The batteries(GP recyko) are still 60% since I put them in. Its simple, light, and efficient. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dsen

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless keyboard for Apple
customer_reviews.text: Best portable keyboard that apple makes, i use this primarily with my apple TV which i use as a media solution. Has a range for me of about 20 feet and never losses connection.
customer_reviews.author: Joninthearmy

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I use this keyboard every day and found that the build quality is superb. Since I purchased this keyboard some after-market versions have started to sell. I know nothing about the quality of these keyboard; but I can tell you that the Apple keyboard is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Works great at a MUCH better price than what you could ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great at a MUCH better price than what you could buy it for t the Apple store. Have had it for at least 6 months. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely mac keyboard for cheaper price
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my keyboard very well. It connected with my computer quickly and types well. My only drawback is that this keyboard seems to be slightly bent. I have to stick a small piece of thin cardboard under one corner so it does not rock back and forth. Not a huge deal though, just a little inconvenience I would've rather not had.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Light, well made, and pairs easily. Typical Apple quality, in other words, outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: It's light, it's well made, it pairs easily. In other words, it's Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: works for weeks on end on 2 rechargeable AA batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: works for weeks on end on 2 rechargeable AA batteries. No need to turn it off, responds instantly, reports battery status when running low... it's Apple. Had to buy this one when the last one gave up its ghost after 6 years under tropical conditions in India.
customer_reviews.author: Ulrich B.

customer_reviews.title: Apple keyboard used with iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my iPad 2. I was a little nervous when I purchased it because a few reviews said it didn't work with the 2...But it works great and I am using it now to write this review. It is sleek and matches my white iPad 2. I LOVE it. It fits in my purse so I can bring it with me and my iPad anywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Cherries27

customer_reviews.title: works great just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: i am very pleased with this product it instantitly connects to my ipad witch was the whole reason i got this keyboard it did not come with batteries but i popped the 2 AA batteries and it connected with ease so overall this product is great for the price witch was 50 dollars refurbished and on the apple website its 80 so great deal looks brand new if you get the refurbished one GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The pictures on the buttons are mostly but not completely accurate (the volume buttons are one off, and some of the other top row stuff is funny). However, it feels nice to type on, I've spilled stuff on it so many times and protected my keyboard. For the price, I certainly got my money's worth, and it arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Use with iPad and iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes that it would make typing easier on the iPad. Well, it makes typing ALOT easier on the iPad! It's easy to pair and works great. I've had it for a few weeks now and haven't had any problems. I don't think that I would use it if I was on the road, or a train. But it's great for home use.
customer_reviews.author: warhorse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I thought buying a used keyboard would be iffy. But Apple does make brilliant products so buying used isn't an issue if you're willing to do so. The quality of the product was just as advertised. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Chirag Patel

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the pacage on time and early and the thing that really impressed me was the pacaging. The selller (bookseverywhere3) was very thourough and was very very well pacaged. All of the buttons work on the keyboard so far and there is no lag to the keyboard and pairs quite fast and is very sleek. The only downside to this order was that the bubble wrap wouldnt pop, which is good for the product but bad for one of my favorite parts of getting pacages. But other than that, everything was perfect and no major problems occured
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Apple Wireless Keyboard - Turning my Macbook into a Desktop
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Apple Wireless Keyboard. I have used this keyboard before, at friends homes and at the Apple Store. I purchased this keyboard to assist in turning my Macbook into a desktop. Well, actually my Macbook is now hooked up to my 52" Samsung LCD. I am utilizing the Apple Magic Trackpad as well. So far this has been a great setup. Very easy to connect via Bluetooth. Very comfortable keyboard to type on, great key response and I can type quickly on this unit. Great buy. You can get a lower price on other wireless keyboards, but the style and function of this minimalistic approach is the best.
customer_reviews.author: O|||||||O

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the news ones which bend and break
customer_reviews.text: Nice angle, won’t bend in the middle, lasts a long time on the battery.
customer_reviews.author: LettersHead

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased a cheaper version that did not work, this one works great with my iPad!
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: is ok, but wife thinks it is too small as she is a senior
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Yedloutschnig

customer_reviews.title: Typing the Day Away
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality keyboard and prompt service...would buy from them again. and a much better buy than what Apple has to offer...!
customer_reviews.author: DIGITALSHOOTER

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: this item was well worth the money i spent.. it logged right on to my computer like as if i owned it all my life.. lol i really don't mind that it was 1 owner before me.. great Buy..!!!
customer_reviews.author: c dub u

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: First of all I love this keyboard. Super low profile and very flat and stylish. It's hard to imagine how it's ergonomic when we're used to seeing contoured keyboards, but it is really nice to work with. The shipping and condition were as promised. Perfect transaction.
customer_reviews.author: David Root

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and its wireless
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of the keyboard. This keyboard takes up little to no space and can be tucked away when not in use very easily. The bluetooth wireless makes integration to the mac seamless and easy. I am glad I picked this up then the larger version I have seen offered.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shopshear

customer_reviews.title: Just a little dent!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried after reading the reviews but the keyboard is fine. The only problem was a dent near the power button which caused some problems in the beginning. It was clean, usable, and just what I needed otherwise. Not bad for a cheap used product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Le

customer_reviews.title: Great portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this keyboard for a month now and the battery meter says it is at 100% capacity, using the batteries that came with it. This keyboard is a work of art and very comfortable to type on. I admire its portability over a larger extended keyboard and do not really miss the calculator pad. This product was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: bluetooth keyboard for iPad (and more)
customer_reviews.text: Great product and certainly makes the iPad a bit more user friendly. Easy to use and fairly mobile. I wish it folded up to a small size like some of the last keyboards I've used. I did find a very nice sleeve for it and with it I'm comforted that it will travel more securely. I would recommend this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Wade W. Norton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Some of the keys not working. This keyboard was returmned to Amazon stating the problem with this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No longevity and bad battery power
customer_reviews.text: the Product did not come with a box and has a low battery life. Had to replace my batteries twice in two weeks. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this keyboard. Keys have a great feel. Set up was easy and straight forward. Battery life seems great. Small overall size. I don't miss the lack of numeric keys at all. Appearance is esthetically very nice. I'm happy that I got this and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Brodzik

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: My macbook pro keyboard has been broken for about a year, I finally decided to get this Apple keyboard and it's made my life SO much easier. It came much quicker than expected, and it looked great. Very pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Also bought this a really long time ago and it's still working great. I use it all the time with my iPad or AppleTV.
customer_reviews.author: Miss_Priss

customer_reviews.title: Very good bluetoot keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It's an Apple bluetooth keyboard, easy to pair, work really well on my macbook pro when I connect it with other monitors plus mouse. Really nice to use.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus Villaca

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good condition when I received and still it feels very nice when I am typing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeongmin L.

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly with work style. Love the feel of keys. No wires.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't figure out at first but once I did it set up quickly and easily!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie N. Eauclaire

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard to match my new mac mini paired with a Dell ST2210 monitor. The keyboard has a small form factor and looks great. The Bluetooth setup was a breeze. After using the keyboard for about a week I noticed a small dent above the F3 key, it was hard to see but I could feel it. I called Amazon on a Friday afternoon and had a replacement keyboard on my desk by Monday afternoon. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: MACMAN

customer_reviews.title: & it looks & performs just like the one I had for years from Apple
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, & it looks & performs just like the one I had for years from Apple. It's the same material & keys are identical as the the original.
customer_reviews.author: MENE MENE TEKEL

product_meta.title: Apple Bluetooth Wireless Keyboard (MC184LL/A)
product_meta.description: Apple Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard in Box Used 2 times. Perfect condition.Model Number MC184LL or A.The completely cable-free Apple Wireless Keyboard uses Bluetooth technology to connect with your Mac or iPad. So you're free to move the keyboard just about anywhere within range and wirelessly type away. And it is slim, compact design takes less space.
feature_bullets: Qwerty layout with special function keys

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars599 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
